snippet.title: STARBITES - Taste of Desert Trailer
snippet.description:
「Bitter」,
the planet that has become desertified from the impact of the space war.
The fate of Lukida, who was making a living in search of machinery debris in the desert, begins to change completely after finding the "Oracle", a legendary treasure.
AIs getting deadly aggressive, abnormal phenomena all over the planet... 

Explore secrets hidden under the 「Bitter」, and build companionship with various characters to achieve new information.
A storytelling RPG where you ride and strengthen the partner Mecha,
and move forward, growing up with your ally from the adventure.

[STARBITES - TASTE OF DESERT]

#indiedev #indiegame #jrpg
